title: I am looking for a team.
body: I am looking for a team to help get the ward skin mainly. but if we can try and push for high silver or gold+. that would also be a good goal to achieve. just add me in game or reply here if anyone is willing to make or invite me to a team.

replies.body:
I'm a mid/support main! I can play top and jungle too, adc isn't my best role but I can practice in norms and customs.
Currently in B3. 
I've been trying to climb by myself and just decided that it's a little too difficult, i'll be on in a few hours so if you can add me that'd be sweet.  ( ^ω^ ) ♥
